data.name: ReadCsePersonImHouseholdImHouseholdMbrMnthlyAdj
data.value: select T4.CSP_NUMBER, T4.IMH_AE_CASE_NO, T3.TYPE, T3.ADJUSTMENT_AMT, T3.LEVEL_APPLIED_TO, T3.CREATED_BY, T3.CREATED_TMST, T3.IMS_MONTH, T3.IMS_YEAR, T3.ADJUSTMENT_REASON, T4.RELATIONSHIP from CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MSUM T4 join CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MADJ T3 on (T4.YEAR0 = T3.IMS_YEAR) and (T4.MONTH0 = T3.IMS_MONTH) and (T4.IMH_AE_CASE_NO = T3.IMH_AE_CASE_NO) and (T4.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T4.IMH_AE_CASE_NO = @imhAeCaseNo) order by T3.IMS_YEAR desc, T3.IMS_MONTH desc, T3.CREATED_TMST desc

data.name: ReadCsePersonImHouseholdImHouseholdMbrMnthlySum
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, IMH_AE_CASE_NO, YEAR0, MONTH0, RELATIONSHIP from CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MSUM where (IMH_AE_CASE_NO = @imhAeCaseNo) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)
